Documentation: The outbound order number is part of the unique identifier of the outbound order.
It is part of the unique identification of the outbound order line. When the line was created via the interface, it is equal to the 'sysPartnerLine'.
Is a part of the unique identification of an item.
Is part of the unique identification of a quantity unit.
Defines the number of quantity units in the reference unit.
Is the unique identification of a SAP special stock type.
Is the unique identification of a SAP stock type.
